items.title: Billionaire Ken Griffin warns on consequences of gold’s rally as Goldman targets nearly $5,000

items.title: I inherited a $400K house. My home is worth the same amount of money. Which one do I sell?
items.description: “I have a mortgage with $60,000 left on it.”

items.title: NYSE owner dives into prediction markets with $2 billion Polymarket investment
items.description: Intercontinental Exchange to invest up to $2 billion in Polymarket, the prediction-market company founded by Shayne Coplan.
